DOCNAME: HUSSEIN v. ALBANIA, BULGARIA, CROATIA, CZECH REPUBLIC, DENMARK, ESTONIA, HUNGARY, ICELAND, IRELAND, ITALY, LATVIA, LITHUANIA, THE NETHERLANDS, POLAND, PORTUGAL, ROMANIA, SLOVAKIA, SLOVENIA, TURKEY, UKRAINE AND THE UNITED KINGDOM
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is an NORP national who was born in DATE . He is the former President of GPE and is currently detained in GPE .

On DATE coalition forces , led by a GPE General , invaded GPE . While the greater part of the forces and support came from GPE ( “ GPE ” ) and GPE ( “ GPE ” ) , it will be assumed for current purposes that the coalition forces included support from each of the respondent States during the relevant period . The coalition forces were composed of Divisions , each with military responsibility for a particular zone of GPE . The GPE divisions controlled the LOC and LOC zones ( the latter including the GPE and GPE regions ) and the CARDINAL multi - national divisions , one commanded by the GPE and the other by GPE , were charged with the south zone and south central zone , respectively .

In DATE GPE forces captured GPE . On DATE a NORP General issued a “ Freedom Message ” announcing the creation of ORG ) , a civilian administration that would exercise powers of government temporarily in GPE . On CARDINAL DATE the GPE Secretary for Defence appointed Ambassador PERSON as Administrator of the CPA . On DATE ORG ( “ IGC ” ) was formed : the Administrator of the CPA could veto all decisions of the ORG . The CPA was to co - ordinate with the ORG on all matter involving the temporary governance of GPE .
On DATE the applicant was captured near GPE by GPE soldiers ( ORG and members of Task Force CARDINAL ) during an operation called “ Operation Red Dawn ” .

On DATE ORG adopted Resolution CARDINAL ( CARDINAL ) whereby it endorsed the formation of a sovereign interim Government of GPE which would assume , by DATE , full responsibility and authority for governing GPE ; it welcomed the end of the occupation and the cessation of the CPA ( also by DATE ) when GPE would reassert its full sovereignty ; and it noted that , pending the assumption of full security responsibility by the NORP security forces , the presence of the multinational force in GPE was at the request of the incoming Interim Government of GPE ( Articles CARDINAL , CARDINAL , DATE and CARDINAL of the ORG ) .
DATE than foreseen , on DATE all CPA authority was transferred to the new NORP Interim Government .
On DATE the applicant was transferred by GPE troops to ORG for trial .
